page.shortlink: Submit a Bug Report For a Web Project Report
page.topic: How to Submit a Bug Report for a Report, Letter, Layout, or Label
page.description: When you report a bug to Alpha Software, a test case is required. For issues with Reports, both the Project Report file and data the report is based on need to be submitted. The *[ui:Create Bug Report Files...]* tool makes it easy to create a test case to submit with a bug report about an issue you're experiencing with a Project Report.

section.title: Creating a Bug Report Zip File for a Report

description.p: The *[ui:Create Bug Report Files...]* tool can be used to easily package up the information needed by the Alpha Software team when reporting a bug with a Report. In most cases, the default settings will generate the information needed.
On the Web Projects Control Panel, right-click the Report to open the Context Menu.
Under the *[ui:DataSource]* menu, select *[ui:Create Bug Report Files...]*
Select a *[ui:Location]* to save the .zip file.

figure.title: Dialog to create a bug report zip file

description.p: If the issue with your report is related to the data, check *[ui:Include Sample Tables]*. Otherwise, you can leave this option unchecked.

note.p: Generated sample tables can be very large if the tables your report is based on have a lot of records.

description.p: Finally, click *[ui:Create]* to generate the .zip file.
After the .zip file is created, send the .zip file along with an explanation of the issue you're experiencing to bugs@alphasoftware.com.
